definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: enclose, surround, cover (Ar. h.af=a, surround, h.ifa0fun side, or border of a thing)—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. [[חׂפֵף עָלָיו]] De 33:12 (poem) he (´[[י]]) is covering him over, fig. of ´[[י]]'s sheltering Benj. (in temple; on omission of subj. v. Ges:§ 116. 5. R. 3).
